Venue & Parking for BSides Roanoke 2026

Venue

Virginia Western Community College
Hall Family Business/Science Building
3940 Colonial Ave, Roanoke, VA 24015
https://maps.app.goo.gl/ToJyoaMJ5BUy417QA

Parking

Parking is available

Transportation

Virginia Western Community College is served by Valley Metro's 55 bus (3rd Street Station to Tanglewood)
